Legal_Issue: Whether the visa officer breached procedural fairness or made an unreasonable decision in rejecting the application
Outcome: Application for judicial review dismissed; original rejection of permanent residency upheld
Credibility_Assessment: Employment letters lacked detail; CV deemed insufficient
Basis_of_Claim: Insufficient and non-detailed documentation provided by applicant
Evaluation_Standard: Reasonableness of decision and adherence to procedural fairness
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to provide detailed employment letters as instructed
Application_Error: Reliance on CV instead of detailed employment letters
Assessment_Standard: Reasonable assessment of evidence and procedural fairness
Application_Factor: Documentation did not meet immigration regulations
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Immigration regulations requiring sufficient and credible documentation
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of detail in employment letters, reliance on CV
Credibility_Issues: Documentation credibility questioned due to lack of detail
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Allegation of procedural unfairness and unreasonable decision-making
Omission_Type: Failure to submit required detailed employment letters
